channel.title: Dialogue problems
channel.description:
2 problems:
1: when I talk to an npc, the npc head moves around like in rs, but when I talk in the conversation, the head stays still and looks like they're stoned. how would i fix this?
2: I can only put one line of dialogue in a panel. also, i can only put 2 options on one panel. how do i add more? (if i add it, it doesn't show up right now)

item.title: Dialogue problems
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

Alot of NPC stuff is done automaticly by the client, you would have to figure out how the model shown in the interface can be manipulated by an emotion. dont ask me how, i have no clue.

@ 2, find a different interface with 2 lines, theres one around somewhere

Read full topic
